mapper.select: select aa.name,aa.owner_type,aa.owner_addr,aa.tel,aa.e_mail,aa.cert_type,aa.cert_number from r_owner aa,r_owner_property bb,r_parking_space cc where aa.id = bb.owner_id and bb.property_id=cc.id and cc.id=#{id} and bb.property_type=#{type} and bb.is_delete=#{del} and cc.is_delete=#{del}
